_description: A hymn to the Creator — five 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Ihesu haue mercy on me’

BodLatLitE17.First Lines:
All mygty god maker of heuyneof erþe watur and
                    wynd…
BodLatLitE17.Last Lines:
…and in heuyn to haue placenow swete ihesu haue merci on
                    me

CULKk16.First Lines:
Almiȝti god maker of HeueneErthe & Eyre Watur &
                    Wynde…
CULKk16.Last Lines:
…In heuene þer to haue a placeEher Ihesu þu haue
                    mercy on me
CULKk16.Attributed Title:
Here enduth this preyere to oure lord And begynneth a nother (f. 197); Here
                    enduth þis preyere to our lord Ihesu And begynneth the ymne Vexilla
                        regis prodeunte (f. 197v)
CULKk16.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 43-4.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 214-15.

BLAdd39574.First Lines:
Almyȝti God maker of heueneEyr and erþe watir and
                    wynde…
BLAdd39574.Last Lines:
…And in heuene to haue a placeNow Ihesu þou haue ercy on
                    me

Day,  Mabel,
